languages.text: "Да мы... да это... в общем, вся бригада в мятежники пошла, ну и мы — вместе со всеми. Старший — это Старший, он за главного, потому что ходил под {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}краснорясыми{/g}, большими машинами управлял. Его тут нет — он только с проверками иногда приходит! Он нам инструкцию составил, как этой махиной управлять, а из нее только половина пунктов как надо работают! Предыдущая смена вся покалечилась, мы сами тут недавно, и уже в ожогах с ног до головы. Отпустите нас, а? Мы не будем больше мятежничать!"

traits.locale_text: "Да мы... да это... в общем, вся бригада в мятежники пошла, ну и мы — вместе со всеми. Старший — это Старший, он за главного, потому что ходил под {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}краснорясыми{/g}, большими машинами управлял. Его тут нет — он только с проверками иногда приходит! Он нам инструкцию составил, как этой махиной управлять, а из нее только половина пунктов как надо работают! Предыдущая смена вся покалечилась, мы сами тут недавно, и уже в ожогах с ног до головы. Отпустите нас, а? Мы не будем больше мятежничать!"

languages.text: "Well, we... er... our entire crew joined the rebels and we tagged along. The Chief, well — he's the Chief. He's in charge because he used to work under the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Red Robes{/g} and man their heavy machinery. He's not here. He only comes over to check up on us every now and then! He wrote us a manual for operating this big boy, but it only does what it's supposed to do half the time! The previous shift got all maimed. We haven't been here long and we're already head to toe in burns. Let us go, will you? We won't be insurging again!"
languages.original_text: "Да мы... да это... в общем, вся бригада в мятежники пошла, ну и мы — вместе со всеми. Старший — это Старший, он за главного, потому что ходил под {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}краснорясыми{/g}, большими машинами управлял. Его тут нет — он только с проверками иногда приходит! Отпустите нас, а? Мы не будем больше мятежничать!"

traits.locale_text: "Well, we... er... our entire crew joined the rebels and we tagged along. Senior, well — he's Senior. The boss. 'Cause he used to operate big machines for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}red robes{/g}. He's not here. He only comes over to check up on us every now and then! He wrote us a manual for operating this big boy but it only does what it's supposed to do half the time! The previous shift got all maimed. We haven't been here long and we're already head to toe in burns. Let us go, will you? We won't insurge again!"

"Well, we... er... our entire crew joined the rebels and we tagged along. The Chief, well — he's the Chief. He's in charge because he used to work under the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Red Robes{/g} and man their heavy machinery. He's not here. He only comes over to check up on us every now and then! He wrote us a manual for operating this big boy, but it only does what it's supposed to do half the time! The previous shift got all maimed. We haven't been here long and we're already head to toe in burns. Let us go, will you? We won't be insurging again!"

languages.text: "Nun ja, wir ... äh ... unsere gesamte Crew hat sich den Rebellen angeschlossen und wir sind einfach mit ihnen mitgekommen. Der Boss, na ja ... ist eben der Boss. Er hat das Sagen, weil er früher unter den {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Roten Roben{/g} gearbeitet und ihre schwere Maschinerie bedient hat. Er ist nicht hier. Er kommt nur ab und zu vorbei, um nach uns zu sehen. Er hat uns ein Handbuch geschrieben, wie man dieses Trumm hier bedient, aber die halbe Zeit über macht das Ding einfach, was es will! Die aus der letzten Schicht wurden alle verstümmelt. Wir sind noch gar nicht lange hier und schon von Kopf bis Fuß voller Verbrennungen. Lasst uns gehen, ja? Wir machen auch nie wieder bei einem Aufstand mit!"
languages.original_text: "Well, we... er... our entire crew joined the rebels and we tagged along. The Chief, well — he's the Chief. He's in charge because he used to work under the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Red Robes{/g} and man their heavy machinery. He's not here. He only comes over to check up on us every now and then! He wrote us a manual for operating this big boy, but it only does what it's supposed to do half the time! The previous shift got all maimed. We haven't been here long and we're already head to toe in burns. Let us go, will you? We won't be insurging again!"

traits.locale_text: "Nun ja, wir ... äh ... unsere gesamte Crew hat sich den Rebellen angeschlossen und wir sind einfach mit ihnen mitgekommen. Senior, ist ... na ja, das ist wie in einer Stellenbeschreibung. Er ist der Boss, weil er früher unter den {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Roten Roben{/g} gearbeitet und ihre schwere Maschinerie bedient hat. Er ist nicht hier. Er kommt nur ab und zu vorbei, um nach uns zu sehen. Er hat uns ein Handbuch geschrieben, wie man dieses Trumm hier bedient, aber die halbe Zeit über macht das Ding einfach, was es will! Die aus der letzten Schicht wurden alle verstümmelt. Wir sind noch gar nicht lange hier und schon von Kopf bis Fuß voller Verbrennungen. Lasst uns gehen, ja? Wir machen auch nie wieder bei einem Aufstand mit!"

languages.text: « Eh bien, on... euh... toute notre équipe a rejoint les rebelles, alors on a suivi le mouvement. Le Chef, eh bien... c'est le Chef. C'est lui qui commande parce qu'il travaillait pour les {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}robes rouges{/g} et qu'il maniait leurs engins lourds. Il est pas là. Il passe que rarement, histoire de faire des inspections ! Il nous a rédigé un manuel d'utilisation de ce monstre, mais franchement, il marche correctement qu'une fois sur deux ! Tous les membres de l'unité précédente ont fini mutilés. On est pas là depuis bien longtemps, mais on est déjà couverts de brûlures de la tête aux pieds. Allez, laissez-nous partir ! On se révoltera plus ! »
languages.original_text: "Well, we... er... our entire crew joined the rebels and we tagged along. The Chief, well — he's the Chief. He's in charge because he used to work under the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Red Robes{/g} and man their heavy machinery. He's not here. He only comes over to check up on us every now and then! He wrote us a manual for operating this big boy, but it only does what it's supposed to do half the time! The previous shift got all maimed. We haven't been here long and we're already head to toe in burns. Let us go, will you? We won't be insurging again!"

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, on... euh... toute notre équipe a rejoint les rebelles, alors on a suivi le mouvement. Senior, eh bien... c'est Senior. C'est lui qui commande parce qu'il travaillait pour les {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}robes rouges{/g} et qu'il maniait leurs engins lourds. Il est pas là. Il passe que rarement, histoire de faire des inspections ! Il nous a rédigé un manuel d'utilisation de ce monstre, mais franchement, il marche correctement qu'une fois sur deux ! Tous les membres de l'unité précédente ont fini mutilés. On est pas là depuis bien longtemps, mais on est déjà couverts de brûlures de la tête aux pieds. Allez, laissez-nous partir ! On se révoltera plus ! »

languages.text: “嗯，我们……呃……我们所有同事都加入了叛军，于是我们也跟着去了。教长，呃……就是教长，也就是我们的头头。他之前在那些{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}红袍人{/g}手下工作，操纵他们的重型机械。不过，他现在不在这儿，只是偶尔过来看看我们！他给我们写了份操作手册，但就算这样，这门大炮也只有一半的时间能正常工作！上一班的人都被它弄残废了，我们没干多久，全身也都烧伤了。放我们走，好吧？我们不会再造反了！”
languages.original_text: "Well, we... er... our entire crew joined the rebels and we tagged along. The Chief, well — he's the Chief. He's in charge because he used to work under the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Red Robes{/g} and man their heavy machinery. He's not here. He only comes over to check up on us every now and then! He wrote us a manual for operating this big boy, but it only does what it's supposed to do half the time! The previous shift got all maimed. We haven't been here long and we're already head to toe in burns. Let us go, will you? We won't be insurging again!"

traits.locale_text: “嗯，我们……呃……我们所有同事都加入了叛军，于是我们也跟着去了。长者，嗯……长者，也就是我们的头头，他之前在那些{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}红袍人{/g}手下工作，操纵他们的重型机械。不过，他现在不在这儿，只是偶尔过来看看我们！他给我们写了份操作手册，但就算这样，这门大炮也只有一半的时间能正常工作！上一班的人都被它弄残了，我们没干多久，全身也都烧伤了。放我们走，好吧？我们不会再造反了！”

languages.text: 「ええと、私たちは…その…クルー全員が反乱軍に加わって、それに同行しました。チーフ、そう…彼はチーフです。彼は以前、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}赤いローブ{/g}の下で働いていて、重機を操作していたので、彼がボスです。今はここにいません。たまに訪れては、状況を確認するだけなんです！彼は、この大きな機械を操作するためのマニュアルを書いてくれましたが、大半は使えず、想定通りに動作しません！前のシフトでは、みんな重傷を負いました。ここに来てまだ間もないのに、既に火傷だらけです。どうか私たちを行かせてくれませんか？もう反乱は起こしませんから！」
languages.original_text: "Well, we... er... our entire crew joined the rebels and we tagged along. The Chief, well — he's the Chief. He's in charge because he used to work under the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Red Robes{/g} and man their heavy machinery. He's not here. He only comes over to check up on us every now and then! He wrote us a manual for operating this big boy, but it only does what it's supposed to do half the time! The previous shift got all maimed. We haven't been here long and we're already head to toe in burns. Let us go, will you? We won't be insurging again!"

traits.locale_text: 「ええと、私たちは…その…クルー全員が反乱軍に加わって、それに同行しました。シニア、そう…彼はシニアです。彼は以前、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}赤いローブ{/g}の下で働いていて、重機を操作していたので、彼がボスです。今はここにいません。たまに訪れては、状況を確認するだけなんです！彼は、この大きな機械を操作するためのマニュアルを書いてくれましたが、大半は使えず、想定通りに動作しません！前のシフトでは、みんな重傷を負いました。ここに来てまだ間もないのに、既に火傷だらけです。どうか私たちを行かせてくれませんか？もう反乱は起こしませんから！」

languages.text: «Bueno, nosotros... eh... toda nuestra tripulación se unió a los rebeldes y nosotros los acompañamos. El jefe, bueno... es el jefe. Está al mando porque solía trabajar con las {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Túnicas Rojas{/g} y manejar su maquinaria pesada. Aquí no está. ¡Solo viene a vernos de vez en cuando! Nos escribió un manual para manejar a este grandullón, ¡pero solo funciona la mitad de las veces! Los del turno anterior fueron mutilados. No llevamos mucho tiempo aquí y ya estamos quemados de arriba a abajo. Déjenos ir. No volveremos a rebelarnos».
languages.original_text: "Well, we... er... our entire crew joined the rebels and we tagged along. The Chief, well — he's the Chief. He's in charge because he used to work under the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Red Robes{/g} and man their heavy machinery. He's not here. He only comes over to check up on us every now and then! He wrote us a manual for operating this big boy, but it only does what it's supposed to do half the time! The previous shift got all maimed. We haven't been here long and we're already head to toe in burns. Let us go, will you? We won't be insurging again!"

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, nosotros... eh... toda nuestra tripulación se unió a los rebeldes y nosotros los acompañamos. El mayor, bueno... es el mayor. Es el jefe porque solía trabajar con las {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Túnicas Rojas{/g} y manejar su maquinaria pesada. Aquí no está. ¡Solo viene a vernos de vez en cuando! Nos escribió un manual para manejar a este grandullón, ¡pero solo funciona la mitad de las veces! Los del turno anterior fueron mutilados. No llevamos mucho tiempo aquí y ya estamos quemados de arriba a abajo. Dejadnos ir. No volveremos a rebelarnos».

languages.text: "Şey, biz... Iııı... Bütün mürettebat isyancılara katıldı, biz de peşlerine takıldık. Şef de Şef işte. Zamanında {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Kırmızı Cübbeliler'in{/g} emrinde ağır makine ustalığı yaptığı için başımızda o var. Şu an burada değil, arada bizi kontrol etmeye gelir! Bize bu izbandutu çalıştırmamız için bir el kitabı yazdı ama yazanlar çoğu zaman işe yaramıyor! Önceki vardiyadakiler komple pert. Biz de daha yeni geldik ama şimdiden tepeden tırnağa yanık içindeyiz. Bırakın bizi gidelim, n'olur? Bir daha asilik yapmayız, tövbe!"
languages.original_text: "Well, we... er... our entire crew joined the rebels and we tagged along. The Chief, well — he's the Chief. He's in charge because he used to work under the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Red Robes{/g} and man their heavy machinery. He's not here. He only comes over to check up on us every now and then! He wrote us a manual for operating this big boy, but it only does what it's supposed to do half the time! The previous shift got all maimed. We haven't been here long and we're already head to toe in burns. Let us go, will you? We won't be insurging again!"

Bize bu izbandutu çalıştırmamız için bir el kitabı yazdı ama yazanlar çoğu zaman işe yaramıyor! Önceki vardiyadakiler komple pert. Biz de daha yeni geldik ama şimdiden tepeden tırnağa yanık içindeyiz. Bırakın bizi gidelim, n'olur? Bir daha asilik yapmayız, tövbe!"
